author: Elastic
description: This rule helps you test and practice using alerts with Elastic Security as you get set up. It’s not a sign of threat activity.
false_positives: This rule is not looking for threat activity. Disable the rule if you're already familiar with alerts.
name: My First Alert
note:
This is a test alert.

This alert does not show threat activity. Elastic created this alert to help you understand how alerts work.

For normal rules, the Investigation Guide will help analysts investigate alerts.

This alert will show once every 24 hours for each host. It is safe to disable this rule.
